title: Graphic designer assistant
snippet:
Hi, 
I'm looking for a graphic designer to join me as a team member to help me with my wedding/event stationery business. 

Position Responsibilities:
- Graphic design creation and/or assisting for new and existing design clients
- Create and/or editing wedding stationery house collections for new customer orders
- Assisting with new products and bespoke stationery projects
- Creating and checking artwork for print
- Creating some mock-ups to present the artwork
- Create some visuals for social media

Applicant must: 
- Be passionate about the work 
- Have passion for design and a vision to challenge the ‘norm’
- Be a details perfectionist with a love for the ‘little things’
- Be proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator / InDesign / Photoshop)
- Be reliable, positive, and friendly! 
- Be available for follow-up, interactions, etc.

Bonus skills (not essential but an awesome plus!):
- Calligraphy / Lettering
- Keen eye for styling
- Writing (for potential blog posts)
- Conversational French 

I'm looking for a long-term relationship. 

I prefer to have a monthly fixed price, so when you apply, give me your proposal. 

If this sounds like the role for you and you’re excited as I am about the opportunity to be part of my team, I'd love to hear from you!
